A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To keep it succinct\, this movie felt very much like a mishmash of \"ideas\" and \"messages\" and gimmicks along with some genuinely amazing filmography periodically mixed in. The director's vision (or was it just a collection of people's suggestions) for this movie was so incoherent and disjointed that it even manifested in the acting (e.g.\, Mark Hamill\, Laura Dern\, Adam Driver).
